message:
Is there any Chrome/FireFox extension, app or anything else can download photos album from facebook page?

- I tried many extensions but nothing worked.

data.message: I once had a Firefox extension that could bulk-download all images on a certain page, it even allowed you to highlight a rectangular area and it would fetch all images inside it, but I can't remember its name :\

i remeber writing script to extract links of pages showing images.
then autohotkey script to make firefox visit these pages.
then going to cash folder and getting them all .and rename them into. jpg
